QuestData.Title: To Honor the Fallen
QuestData.Description:
Souls are not the only plunder Helya craves, and the kvaldir are ever eager to please.
Among their spoils are the venerable blades of fallen heroes who dared stand against Helya's minions. These blades belong in a place of honor, not among their wretched kind.
Reclaim the blades, for the honor of the Tideskorn!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Ancient Tideskorn Blades from the kvaldir in Helmouth Shallows.
QuestData.RewardText: I will see that these blades are returned where they belong.$B$BThe dead smile upon you, outsider.
